item.title: New module: system/jansson version 2.13.1
item.description: C library for encoding, decoding and manipulating JSON data.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: physics/swash version 9.01a
item.description: SWASH (an acronym of Simulating WAves till SHore) is a non-hydrostatic wave-flow model.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: biology/py-vcf2gwas version 0.8.9_py39
item.description: Python API for comprehensive GWAS analysis using GEMMA.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: biology/gemma version 0.98.5
item.description: GEMMA is a software toolkit for fast application of linear mixed models (LMMs) and related models to genome-wide association studies (GWAS) and other large-scale data sets.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: math/stata version 18
item.description: Stata is a complete, integrated statistical software package that provides everything you need for data analysis, data management, and graphics.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: system/nvtop version 3.0.2
item.description: Nvtop stands for NVidia TOP, a (h)top like task monitor for NVIDIA GPUs.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: chemistry/terachem version 1.95A
item.description: TeraChem is general purpose quantum chemistry software designed to run on NVIDIA GPU architectures.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: chemistry/terachem version 1.96H-beta
item.description: TeraChem is general purpose quantum chemistry software designed to run on NVIDIA GPU architectures.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: chemistry/terachem version default
item.description: TeraChem is general purpose quantum chemistry software designed to run on NVIDIA GPU architectures.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: devel/py-schwimmbad version 0.3.2_py39
item.description: schwimmbad provides a uniform interface to parallel processing pools and enables switching easily between local development (e.g., serial processing or with multiprocessing) and deployment on a cluster or supercomputer (via, e.g., MPI or JobLib).
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: math/py-emcee version 3.1.4_py39
item.description: The Python ensemble sampling toolkit for affine-invariant MCMC
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: math/py-cupy version 12.1.0_py39
item.description: CuPy is an implementation of NumPy-compatible multi-dimensional array on CUDA.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: system/ncdu version 2.2.1
item.description: Ncdu is a disk usage analyzer with an ncurses interface.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: system/ncdu version 1.18.1
item.description: Ncdu is a disk usage analyzer with an ncurses interface.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: devel/py-rmm version 23.04.00_py39
item.description: Python interface for RMM
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: devel/rmm version 23.04.00
item.description: RAPIDS Memory Manager library
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: devel/py-cutlass version 3.1.0_py39
item.description: Python interface for CUTLASS
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: devel/cutlass version 3.1.0
item.description: CUTLASS is a collection of CUDA C++ template abstractions for implementing high-performance matrix-multiplication (GEMM) at all levels and scales within CUDA.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: chemistry/vasp version 6.4.1
item.description: The Vienna Ab initio Simulation Package (VASP) is a computer program for atomic scale materials modelling, e.g. electronic structure calculations and quantum-mechanical molecular dynamics, from first principles.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: devel/nvhpc version 23.3
item.description: NVIDIA HPC Software Development Kit (SDK) including C, C++, and Fortran compilers.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: math/gurobi version 10.0.1_py39
item.description: The Gurobi Optimizer is a commercial optimization solver for mathematical programming.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: chemistry/gromacs version 2023.1
item.description: GROMACS is a versatile package to perform molecular dynamics, i.e. simulate the Newtonian equations of motion for systems with hundreds to millions of particles.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: system/py-linktest version 2.1.19_py39
item.description: LinkTest is a communication API benchmarking tool that tests point-to-point connections.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: system/sionlib version 1.7.7
item.description: Scalable I/O library for parallel access to task-local files.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)
